entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
